other_tests.findings: The liver demonstrates normal echotexture with no focal lesions. The gallbladder is mildly distended and filled with stones. There is mild gallbladder wall thickening, measuring up to 4 mm. Sonographic Murphy's sign is absent. There is no pericholecystic fluid. The common bile duct measures 6 mm. The portal vein is patent and demonstrates hepatopetal flow. The right kidney measures 10.2 cm and the left kidney measures 11 cm. There is no evidence of hydronephrosis or masses. The spleen measures 8.1 cm.
